dict.acceptation: 通讯，通信；交流；书信；传达；

sent.orig: In business management, communication can happen using oral communication, written communication, and electronic communication.
sent.trans: 企业管理方面，沟通的方式可分为口头沟通、书面沟通和电讯沟通。

sent.orig: Chapter two is literature review. It examines communication, cross-cultural communication, and nonverbal communication in detail.
sent.trans: 第二章为文献综述，对交际、跨文化交际和非语言交际这几个名词进行了详细介绍。

sent.orig: Network communication program of DNC communication platform and communication of serial port server is developed.
sent.trans: 开发了DNC通讯平台的网络通信程序和串口服务器的通信程序。

sent.orig: The article holds that human communication system consists of two parts: verbal communication and non-verbal communication.
sent.trans: 认为人类的交际系统由两部分组成：言语交际和非言语交际系统。

sent.orig: The current achievements communication mostly is the downward communication, but very little has the upward communication.
sent.trans: 当前的绩效沟通大多是下行沟通，而很少有上行沟通。
